title: NBA star Kevin Love is donating $500,000 to UCLA for anxiety and depression research
description: Kevin Love is using his All-Star power to support and advocate for stronger mental health research. The Cleveland Cavaliers forward has committed $500,000 to UCLA's psychology department to aid in mental health research, the university said.
